list.description: variable for repeating the DNS panels
list.label: record
list.name: record

list.description: variable for repeating the ICMP panels
list.label: target
list.name: target

list.description: variable for repeating the HTTP panels
list.label: endpoint
list.name: endpoint

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES  WITH KEY=Network WHERE Type =~ /$Type/
list.label: Network
list.name: network
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES  WITH KEY=Network WHERE Type =~ /$Type/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY=CPE WHERE Network =~ /$network/ AND Type =~ /$Type/
list.label: CPE
list.name: cpe
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY=CPE WHERE Network =~ /$network/ AND Type =~ /$Type/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES  WITH  KEY=host WHERE CPE =~ /$cpe/ AND Type =~ /$Type/ AND Network =~ /$network/
list.label: Probe
list.name: probe
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES  WITH  KEY=host WHERE CPE =~ /$cpe/ AND Type =~ /$Type/ AND Network =~ /$network/
